title: "Building a Solid Data Foundation is the First Step to Driving Better Intelligence"
excerpt: "Legal technologies will only become more advanced, giving AI-assisted lawyers such an unfair advantage over their competitors that not using AI may start to border on malpractice. But there’s a catch: You don’t get this unfair advantage unless your data is clean and complete for the purposes at hand."
